pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Django Simple Worker#### Installation```shellpip install django-simple-worker```Add to installed apps:```pythonINSTALLED_APPS = [ 'simpleworker',]```Add to your urls (optional):```pythonpath('simpleworker/', include(('simpleworker.urls', 'simpleworker'), namespace='simpleworker')),```#### ConfigurationAdd to Django settings:```pythonSIMPLE_WORKER_SYNC_PROCESSING = env.bool('SIMPLE_WORKER_SYNC_PROCESSING', default=False)```#### UsageTODO
